value.string:
# XXX For now, this script requires proxy manager
 # must always return a list of dicts
 
 from Products.ZSQLCatalog.SQLCatalog import Query, ComplexQuery
 category_list = []
 
 if obj is None:
 return []
 
 portal = obj.getPortalObject()
 state_list = portal.getPortalCurrentInventoryStateList() + \
 portal.getPortalReservedInventoryStateList() + \
 portal.getPortalTransitInventoryStateList()
 
 item_portal_type = "Slave Instance"
 
 for movement in obj.getMovementList():
 item = movement.getAggregateValue(portal_type=item_portal_type)
 if item is not None:
 software_release = movement.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Software Release")
 computer_partition = movement.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Computer Partition")
 query = ComplexQuery(
 Query(aggregate_relative_url=computer_partition.getRelativeUrl()),
 Query(aggregate_relative_url=software_release.getRelativeUrl()),
 operator="AND",
 )
 catalog_result = portal.portal_catalog(portal_type="Sale Packing List Line",
 simulation_state=state_list,
 aggregate_relative_url=query,
 )
 for sale_packing_list_line in catalog_result:
 software_instance = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(
 portal_type="Software Instance")
 if software_instance is not None:
 return {"Auditor": [software_instance.getReference(),]}
 
 return category_list
